/scope/over19.en: Access if you are 19 years of age or over from '%host'.

/scope/under20over65.en: Access if you are under 20 or over 65 years in age from '%host'.

/scope/namePhoto.en: Access your name and photo from '%host'.

/scope/region.en: Access your region (first half of your postal code) from '%host'.

/scope/details.en: Access your name, date of birth, address and photo from '%host'.
